content: You can settle creatures in the Eco-Tank. Why not try fishing in the <style=Highlight>river</style> for some different <style=Highlight>freshwater fish</style>?

content: The Eco-Tank already has enough freshwater fish. Go catch some different <style=Highlight>insects</style> around here!

content: The Eco-Tank is now teeming with insects and freshwater fish...

content: Looks like there's still room in the Eco-Tank for a few more <style=Highlight>marine creatures</style>!
